backend/main.mo: Core LandCanister logic implementing land data structures, user profiles, loot caches, modifiers, and zone calculations with admin access control.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Instructions for performing a full forced reinstall of Land and Asset canisters on IC mainnet with required prerequisites and backup steps.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Pre-deployment checklist outlining environment setup and required .env variables for the CyberGenesis frontend.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Mainnet deployment guide detailing prerequisites and the sequence for deploying all CyberGenesis canisters and assets.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: High-level deployment instructions emphasizing correct canister deployment order and environment configuration.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer overview of CyberGenesis, describing architecture, multi-canister system roles, and inter-canister communication.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Guide listing required frontend environment variables and network configuration details.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide explaining environment variable configuration and backend canister deployment for resolving common errors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a required WebGL transparency fix in CubeVisualization.tsx and associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Summaries of multiple frontend files describing UI components, hooks, 3D rendering behavior, and stability fixes.
frontend/.env: Production environment configuration for IC mainnet including all required canister IDs, admin principal, and stability settings.
frontend/.env.example: Template .env file showing required environment variables for network config, canister IDs, Internet Identity, and debug options.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main module with cache disabled.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling identity, actor initialization, profile setup flow, reinitialization state, and themed loading UI.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining assets, user profiles, roles, and the asset canister API.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory describing the asset canister service, including asset CRUD and access control.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL definitions for the main backend canister, covering land data, rewards, modifiers, and user roles.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: React component for uploading GLB land models with health checks and admin authorization.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin UI for checking canister health and uploading GLB files with validation.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostics tool running tests and logging status for the asset canister and related actors.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: Component providing admin-only reinitialization workflow with pre- and post-checks for canister health.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Runs health checks against multiple gateways for two canisters, aggregates status, and generates reports with recommendations.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Displays whether environment canister IDs match their expected values and highlights any mismatches.
Validates required environment variables and shows a blocking error banner when critical values are missing.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders an animated 2D cosmic background with stars and nebulae using a canvas-based effect.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: Displays biome-specific 3D models with lighting, orbit controls, and a custom HDR bloom post‑processing pipeline.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file noting that 3D logic has been moved to LandModel.tsx.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Component checks health status of Land and Asset canisters, periodically refreshing and displaying status with icons and toast messages.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Provides UI for discovering and processing loot caches, handling token costs, land charge checks, and updating related queries.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches component errors and displays a styled fallback panel with optional custom fallback.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Implements staking, proposal creation, and voting UI using backend queries and mutations with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Displays land details, handles reward claiming, upgrades, modifier application, and cooldown timers with several queries and mutations.
Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads and renders a GLTF land model with KTX2 textures, applies biome-based material tweaks, and auto-fits the camera to the scene.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: Displays a land card with navigation buttons, showing the selected land’s name, biome, and index.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Shows a top‑10 leaderboard of lands with loading and error states, formatting ranks and token balances.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Renders an interactive map canvas with zoom, drag, and pinch gestures, centering on the user’s land position.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Implements marketplace listing, filtering, buying, and selling logic for lands and modifiers with dialogs and mutations.
Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Runs periodic health checks on the asset canister, reporting latency, status, and uptime with expandable UI.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Draws animated 2D canvas particles with movement, glow effects, and connecting lines as a background.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: Provides UI to edit a land plot’s name and decoration URL using update mutations and form inputs.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Renders a connect button or connected wallet dropdown for Plug Wallet with principal display and actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form allowing a user to submit their name and trigger a save profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Displays a fullscreen overlay showing connection reinitialization status, attempt count, and gateway details.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with a reset option.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Defines mainnet configuration, canister IDs, utilities for model URLs, config validation, and initialization helpers.
Context providing Plug Wallet connection state, connect/disconnect logic, principal handling, and actor creation.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Defines a static list of 45+ planned modifiers with ids, names, rarity tiers, and asset URLs.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for governance backend interfaces, including proposals, votes, and staking operations.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory describing the governance canister’s service, records, and variant response types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Provides automatic actor reinitialization with gateway rotation, retries, and UI feedback on connection recovery.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Extension of useActor that performs initialization checks with progressive backoff and multi-step connectivity validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Creates and maintains an asset canister actor with environment validation, health checks, gateway selection, and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Simple hook that performs a delayed health check on the asset canister and returns its status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: React hook that uploads GLB files to an asset canister using Plug wallet authentication and reports progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Initializes and manages a governance canister actor with retries, gateway failover, and Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Initializes and manages a marketplace canister actor with retry logic, gateway selection, and Internet Identity integration.
Defines reusable transaction hooks for executing token, marketplace, and governance actions through Plug Wallet actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains react-query hooks for fetching and mutating land, user profile, token, governance, and marketplace data via backend actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Initializes a token canister actor with retry logic, gateway failover, and Internet Identity support.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, fonts, and neon/glassmorphism effects for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Provides build timestamp/version metadata and cache‑busting URL helpers.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Implements global 3D debug mode utilities for logging, GPU diagnostics, and scene stability checks.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty placeholder for model loading utilities.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Offers formatting and parsing helpers for ICRC‑1 token amounts with decimal handling and separators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for the marketplace backend canister including listings, item types, and buy results.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the marketplace canister service, types, and query/update methods.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Displays a catalog of modifiers, computing rarity counts and rendering tier-based styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Provides the main app dashboard with tab navigation, land data fetching, and dynamic component rendering based on selected tab.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the login screen using Internet Identity with animated UI and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Handles initial land data fetching and displays loading or success states before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Renders a page for validating canister configuration IDs with a verification component.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: Defines TypeScript types and interfaces for the token backend canister, including transfer and admin operations.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Provides the candid IDL factory for the token backend service, defining account, transfer, metadata, and mint interfaces.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: Declares WebGPU TypeScript interfaces to allow feature detection without build errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from session or URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color tokens, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite build setup with React, environment injection, WASM handling, cache‑busted filenames, aliases, and dev server proxy.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata and fix requests related to enforcing transparent canvas rendering in Three.js.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian-language deployment intro covering project overview, requirements, and installation steps.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Uploads .glb assets to the ICP mainnet AssetCanister with validation, rate limiting, and post‑upload verification.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Uploads multiple tiered .glb model files to a local AssetCanister using dfx and verifies results.
unknown.txt: Contains a fragment referencing testing a health endpoint.
